name: Miko Gakkou Monogatari: Kaede Episode
description: In a world where humans and youkai coexist, uppity second year shrine maiden student Kaede Yamabuki finds herself in a pinch as the winter recess starts. A pair of strange glasses found in the woods leads her to her toughest challenge yet: falling in love.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2GHz or faster 32-bit or 64-bit processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics device DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core 2.4GHz or faster 64-bit processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics device DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Required
